props.modelValue: Visiblity state of the alert. Skip v-model to make alert static
props.dismissable: If `false` close button is not rendered and the alert cannot be dissmised
props.autoDismissDelay: Delay after which alert is closed
props.icon: Alert has few default icons for variants: 'success', 'warn', 'danger', 'info', 'valid', 'invalid'. Icon or default slot can be used for a custom icon.
props.closeButton: Attributes of the v-close-button component. See documentation for the valid values
props.modAlert: Style of the main alert element

slots.icon: Slot for the icon prepending message
